mapper.insert: insert into db_ckyexpresstype (SID, 'NAME', COUNTRY, OPER, OPERTIME, FLAG, OPENFLAG, SORT, RESERVE1, RESERVE2) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_ckyexpresstype set 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRY = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SID, 'NAME', COUNTRY, OPER, OPERTIME, FLAG, OPENFLAG, SORT, RESERVE1, RESERVE2 from db_ckyexpresstype
